markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Consumption](/Rules.aspx?ID=1828)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 541</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Consumption is a numerical value that indicates the Food commodities the settlement requires in order to remain viable and functional. The number given here shows the settlement's base consumption; specific structures in the settlements can increase or decrease its Consumption.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Consumption

<additional-info>

</additional-info>
text: Consumption Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 541 Consumption is a numerical value that indicates the Food commodities the settlement requires in order to remain viable and functional. The number given here shows the settlement's base consumption; specific structures in the settlements can increase or decrease its Consumption.
